19.eng-name: The Book of the Prayer for the Two 'Eids

hadiths.text: Wahb bin Kaisan said:"Eid and Jumu'ah fell on the same day during the time of Ibn Az-Zubair, so he delayed going out until the sun had risen quite high. Then he went out and delivered a Khutbah, and he made the Khutbah lengthy. Then he came down and prayed, and he did not lead the people in praying jumu'ah that day. Mention of that was made to Ibn 'Abbas and he said: 'He has followed the sunnah

chapter.ara-name: باب الرُّخْصَةِ فِي التَّخَلُّفِ عَنِ الْجُمُعَةِ، لِمَنْ شَهِدَ الْعِيدَ
chapter.eng-name: Concession allowing those who attended 'Eid prayer not to attend jumu'ah
